description: Image of a woman with dark hair piled on the top of her head looking toward the viewer's left; she is wearing a robe with a cream ground and slightly darker tan grape leaves and vines on it as well as a black sash; the front of her robe is open and she holds a mostly bald child to her breast; the child reaches up to her sternum with its PL arm; framed in dark wood
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Variegations of Blooms According to their Speech (Saki-wake kotoba no hana 咲分けヶ言葉の花)
title: The Wife
